alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 11 at 3:34AM EST until November 12 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...A south wind 20 to 30 MPH with gusts of 40 to 50 MPH is expected. The strongest gusts should be along the immediate coast. * WHERE...The New Jersey counties of Monmouth, Ocean, southeastern Burlington, Atlantic and Cape May. * WHEN...From 11:00 PM this evening until 9:00 AM Saturday. * IMPACTS...The gusty wind may blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be brought down and scattered power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution while driving, especially if operating a large vehicle. Secure outdoor objects such as trash bins and lawn furniture.
